name: Axe Showergel ice chill
composition: Ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Menthol, Lactic Acid, Disodium EDTA, PPG-6, Lippia Citriodora Flower/Leaf/Stem Water, Saccharide Isomerate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 19140, CI 42090.
